content: The Hong Kong team will return to Kai Tak Stadium on 14 October to face Bangladesh! Can they carry the momentum from their impressive victory in June to secure another win? This match is part of the third round of the 2027 AFC Asian Cup qualifiers, where only the top team will advance to the final tournament. Both teams are sure to give their all, promising an exhilarating match for the football fans! Tickets will be on sale on the Ticketflap at 11am on 2 October. Dont miss your chance to witness this historic moment live! Ticket Price Hong Kong China Fans Zone (Lower Bowl): HK$200 Hong Kong China Fans Zone (Upper Bowl): HK$80 Standard Ticket (Lower Bowl): HK$200 Standard Ticket (Upper Bowl): HK$150 Standard Ticket (Upper Bowl): HK$80 Bangladesh Fans Zone (Upper Bowl)*: HK$80 *Tickets for the Bangladesh Fans Zone are unavailable on Ticketflap. For further details, please contact the Football Association of Hong Kong, China.
title: AFC Asian Cup Qualifiers - Third Round (Hong Kong, China vs. Bangladesh) - Kai Tak Sports Park
